name: Checkbox.Root

disabled.description: Whether or not the checkbox button is disabled. This prevents the user from interacting with it.
disabled.description_zh: 复选框按钮是否被禁用。这会阻止用户与其交互。

checked.description: The checkbox button's checked state. This can be a boolean or the string 'indeterminate', which would typically display a dash in the checkbox.
checked.description_zh: 复选框按钮的选中状态。这可以是布尔值或字符串“不确定”，通常会在复选框中显示破折号。

required.description: Whether or not the checkbox is required.
required.description_zh: 该复选框是否为必填项。

name.description: The name of the checkbox. This is used for form submission.
name.description_zh: 复选框的名称。这用于表单提交。

value.description: The value of the checkbox. This is used for form submission.
value.description_zh: 复选框的值。这用于表单提交。

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: 是否对此组件使用渲染委派。

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: 正在呈现的基础 DOM 元素。您可以绑定到此元素以编程方式与元素进行交互。

description: The button component used to toggle the state of the checkbox.

events.name: onCheckedChange
events.description: A callback that is fired when the checkbox button's checked state changes.
events.description_zh: A callback that is fired when the checkbox button's checked state changes.

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: 如果使用带有委托的 asChild 属性，则要应用于元素的构建器属性和操作。
